observation: Property For Sale & Rent | Estate Agents in London, Wimbledon SW19, Colliers Wood SW19, Earlsfield SW18, Merton Park SW20, Mitcham, Raynes Park SW20  Instant Valuation Home Lettings Sales Landlord Zone Tenant Zone Tenant Application Certifications CMP MemberShip Certificate Contact Us Login Buy Rent All Property Types Barn Conversion Bedsit Bedroom 1 2 Bathroom Reception Search Top properties Check out some of our listed properties Asking Price £487,000 For Sale A Beautifully Presented 3 Bedroom Family Home Oakmead Place, Mitcham, CR4 3 £625,000 A Bright & Spacious Three Bedroom House Cobham Avenue, New Malden, KT3 A SPACIOUS SPLIT LEVEL ONE BEDROOM Church Road, CR4 KNIGHTS HILL SE27 London  UNIQUE RARELY  AVAILABLE 1 BED STUDIO with PRIVATE GARDEN London, SE27 £1,300 pcm For Rent Offers in excess of £350,000 CASH BUYERS ONLY - LEASE REMAINING 52 YEARS - WELL PRESENTED TWO BEDROOM GARDEN FLAT Crealock Street, London, SW18 View All properties Free Online Valuation in 60 Seconds Click here What people say about us Very quick to respond and to resolve the issues. Especially Cheryl and James are very friendly and professional at the same time. Also, if you're a tenant, there is no agency fees! What else would you ask for? I would recommend - Berzan Balin What I like about them is the simplicity of their service, with no hidden costs, unlike with the majority of agencies I've been dealing with who will charge astronomical fees. Also, they are good for the tenants who don't have to pay any commission, like they would with other agencies. - Leslie McAngus A very honest and ethical agency that is trying to change the reputation given to estate agents. I feel they act in the clients interest instead of their own and I had a pleasant experience while selling my property. Highly recommended. - Afrahim Hussain My relationship with Rentals&Sales started few years back with an amazing place to live they've provided me with. I've never had any issues, staff was always nice and approachable and I would definitely like to stay in touch in case I'd be planning to move back into the area. So far it's the best letting agency I've been in touch with and I can't express how sad I am that our relationship comes to an end. I can strongly recommend them with full confidence of them not letting you down, ever. - Lukasz Raczylo 4 Download RentalsandSales.CO.UK Ltd App How to download and install " Click on the below icon to download the RentalsandSales.CO.UK Ltd App from the App Store. If you continue using our website, we'll assume that you are happy to receive all cookies on this website. Continue Learn more
